name: VUNO Color System
description: W3C Design Tokens for VUNO - AI Healthcare/Medical Imaging brand

500.$description: Primary brand color - medical trust, innovation, precision
500.$psychology: Conveys reliability, expertise, and scientific precision. Associated with medical technology and trustworthiness in healthcare contexts.
Represents healing, balance, and advanced technology. Complements primary blue in medical/tech contexts.

500.$description: Secondary accent - positive clinical outcomes, healthy data
500.$psychology: Associated with health, growth, and positive outcomes. Perfect for indicating successful diagnoses or treatment efficacy.

500.$description: Secondary accent - advanced analytics, AI insights
500.$psychology: Conveys advanced AI/ML capabilities, scientific innovation, and forward-thinking. Associated with premium, intelligent features.

500.$description: Accent - highlights, focus states, interactive elements
Success state - positive outcomes, validated data, healthy results
Warning state - caution, requires attention, clinical alerts
Error state - critical alerts, contraindications, system errors
Info state - informational messages, educational content

50.$description: Lightest neutral - backgrounds, very light UI

primary.$description: Dark mode primary text - nearly white

secondary.$description: Dark mode secondary text - light gray

tertiary.$description: Dark mode tertiary text - muted gray

500.$description: Dark mode primary - lightened for contrast

primary.psychology: Sky Blue - Trust, Professionalism, Calm, Technology
primary.healthcare_context: Conveys medical expertise, trustworthiness, and precision. The sky blue tone feels modern, approachable, yet professional. Strongly associated with medical/tech industries without being sterile.
primary.vuno_alignment: Perfect for a healthcare AI company - communicates both innovation and trustworthiness to clinicians and patients alike.

secondary_teal.psychology: Teal - Balance, Healing, Scientific Innovation, Wellness
secondary_teal.healthcare_context: Evokes balance between art and science of medicine. Healing and patient-centered care. Modern, sophisticated.
secondary_teal.vuno_alignment: Represents wellness outcomes and precision medicine through AI.

secondary_emerald.psychology: Emerald Green - Growth, Health, Positive Outcomes, Vitality
secondary_emerald.healthcare_context: Indicates healthy results, positive diagnoses, treatment success. Associated with life and wellness.
secondary_emerald.vuno_alignment: Perfect for showing successful AI predictions, healthy patients, positive outcomes.

secondary_purple.psychology: Purple - Intelligence, Advanced Technology, Premium, Creativity
secondary_purple.healthcare_context: Represents advanced AI/ML capabilities, sophisticated analysis, cutting-edge technology.
secondary_purple.vuno_alignment: Ideal for highlighting VUNO's advanced AI algorithms and premium features.

semantic_success.psychology: Medical Green - Positive diagnosis, treatment efficacy, healthy metrics
semantic_success.healthcare_context: Universally recognized in healthcare as 'positive' or 'healthy'. Used for normal lab values, successful procedures.
semantic_success.vuno_alignment: Indicates successful AI predictions, normal imaging results, positive clinical outcomes.

semantic_warning.psychology: Clinical Amber - Caution, requires clinical attention, monitor closely
semantic_warning.healthcare_context: Alerts clinicians to review findings, watch for changes, potential concerns.
semantic_warning.vuno_alignment: Used for subtle abnormalities, findings needing radiologist review, areas to monitor.

semantic_error.psychology: Critical Red - Urgent attention required, contraindication, critical finding
semantic_error.healthcare_context: Immediately catches attention. Used for critical lab values, acute findings, life-threatening conditions.
semantic_error.vuno_alignment: Reserved for critical AI findings, urgent alerts, contraindications detected.

semantic_info.healthcare_context: Provides context without alarm. Used for educational content, definitions, references.
semantic_info.vuno_alignment: Educational tooltips, help text, reference information about AI analysis.

usage_guidelines.primary_blue: Main brand color for logos, primary buttons, active states, focus indicators, key metrics displays
usage_guidelines.secondary_teal: Alternative accent, wellness features, data accuracy indicators, precision metrics
usage_guidelines.secondary_emerald: Success states, positive outcomes, healthy results, treatment efficacy indicators
usage_guidelines.secondary_purple: AI/ML features, advanced analytics, premium capabilities, intelligent insights
usage_guidelines.accent_cyan: Interactive elements, highlights, hover states, special attention areas
usage_guidelines.accent_indigo: Call-to-action buttons, primary actions, important links
usage_guidelines.semantic_green: Success messages, normal results, healthy patients, positive metrics (WCAG AA/AAA compliant)
usage_guidelines.semantic_amber: Warning alerts, areas needing review, monitor status, clinical caution (WCAG AA/AAA compliant)
usage_guidelines.semantic_red: Critical errors, urgent alerts, critical findings, contraindications (WCAG AA/AAA compliant)
usage_guidelines.semantic_blue: Informational messages, educational content, help text, definitions (WCAG AA/AAA compliant)
usage_guidelines.neutral_900: Primary body text, headings, high contrast areas
usage_guidelines.neutral_400: Disabled states, muted information, secondary labels
usage_guidelines.dark_mode_text_primary: Main text in dark mode - excellent contrast against dark backgrounds
usage_guidelines.dark_mode_background_primary: Card and surface backgrounds in dark mode

accessibility_notes.wcag_aa_compliance: All color combinations meet or exceed WCAG AA minimum contrast ratio of 4.5:1 for normal text
accessibility_notes.wcag_aaa_compliance: Critical semantic colors (success, warning, error) exceed WCAG AAA minimum contrast ratio of 7:1
accessibility_notes.colorblind_safe: Palette designed avoiding red-green combinations for primary interactive elements. Semantic colors supported by icons and patterns.
accessibility_notes.dark_mode_contrast: Dark mode colors maintain accessibility with lightened primary colors and maximum contrast on dark backgrounds
accessibility_notes.recommendations: Always pair semantic colors with icons or patterns, not color alone. Test with accessibility tools before deployment.
